title: DigiRoto Watch Face
summary: BL3CK FACE: Minimal / Material Digital watch face for android Wear
description: Your life in time with this futuristic and classy piece of smart watch making.Optimized for Round and Square watches (tested on LG GWatchR, LG GWatch, Asus ZenWatch, Moto360)Android Wear 5.0x CompliantWatch face features:★ Time (Analog/Minimal and Digital dial)★ Customizable analog dial colors (via companion app)★ AM/PM selector (via companion app)★ Date, day and month ★ Absolute bl3ck background to preserve battery drain ★  Dimmed mode almost the same as normal viewù★  Special dimmed  for Asus Zenwatch lowbit mode More•  Visit our exclusive Android Wear faces collection for Android Wear on the Play Store•  Please let us know if you like to have any other faces (analog, digital or both) to be added to our selection. Designed and crafted in Italy by Stefano&Riccardo
descriptionHTML:
Your life in time with this futuristic and classy piece of smart watch making.
Optimized for Round and Square watches (tested on LG GWatchR, LG GWatch, Asus ZenWatch, Moto360)
Android Wear 5.0x Compliant

Watch face features:
★ Time (Analog/Minimal and Digital dial)
★ Customizable analog dial colors (via companion app)
★ AM/PM selector (via companion app)
★ Date, day and month
★ Absolute bl3ck background to preserve battery drain
★ Dimmed mode almost the same as normal viewù
★ Special dimmed for Asus Zenwatch lowbit mode

More
• Visit our exclusive Android Wear faces collection for Android Wear on the Play Store
• Please let us know if you like to have any other faces (analog, digital or both) to be added to our selection.
Designed and crafted in Italy by Stefano&Riccardo
comments: One of the best looking digital watch faces on the market. I really like the concept and the customization options.
